body:
I thought this would be a pretty funny thing to share. From formatting errors, to grammical and spelling errors, we all have them! So, share your first post on the forums!

Hi, I'm vobaseball12. I'm pretty new to this server. Here's some things about me:1. I come from OCN, and have been playing there for about 2 years.2. I know TheTNTDude :P3. You can call me vo.Hoep to see you In-game!

#myFirstMap
around one and a half year ago I posted this map, it was the beginning of some nize maps and it got me into Avicus!

Bleen Rings

Created By: schmenni
Game: Nebula
Teams: Green vs Blue
Details: My first map for the Avicus Network. It has diamonds in the middle. More stuff...

replies.body:
"Hey guys.

So, I joined Avicus about 3 months ago but haven't really been active.
After taking a month off I really want to reintegrate myself into this community.
My computer is getting fixed so I can't go on the servers for a bit but for the time being it would be awesome to interact and meet new people on the forums.

My name is Snow and I want to be apart of this awesome community!

See you round mate!"

Taken from July 9th 2014.  Titled "Who's this guy?"
https://avicus.net/forums/be92f8dd7

6th August 2013 

Ha, that was for the MCzone tourney, glory days lmao. I got in a team by the way so +1 for useless forum spam.

I really wish i could see my first ever post but i'm sure it'll just be an introduction one anyway.
